ods by 12.3 PCK abs (39.0% relative improvement). Our method demonstrates 
a clear advantage for handling multi-person 3D poses. 
As for root-relative results, our method achieves 82.0 PCK rel and 43.5 AUC rel . 
Note that the PCK result relies on the threshold value. AUC can reflect a more 
reliable result since it computes the area under the PCK curve from various 
thresholds. Our method outperforms the previous methods by 3.7 AUC rel .
